derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin proclamatio(n-), from proclamare 'shout out' (see proclaim)

entry.def: A proclamation is a public announcement about something important, often about something of national importance.

stems_affixes.word_buile: declaim[[v.朗诵;谴责]]→n.慷慨演说;雄辩
proclaim[[v.公布;声明]]省鷑.宣告;宣言
ac一再+claim呼喊,叫喊→一再喊→欢呼
pro在前+claim呼喊,叫喊→在前面喊→公布
re回+claim呼喊,叫喊→喊回来→收回来,引申为开荒
